sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>oauth_entity</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>create entry in keeper security creds</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	try{
		var token_table = "x_keese_keeper_sec_keeper_security_credentials";
        
		var oauthSysId = current.sys_id.toString();
		gs.info("oauthsysid is"+oauthSysId);
        var clientRequest = new sn_auth.GlideOAuthClientRequest();
        var tokenResponse = clientRequest.getTokenByGrantType("client_credentials", oauthSysId);

        if (tokenResponse.isAccessTokenValid()) {
			var tokenStore = new GlideRecord(token_table);
			tokenStore.initialize();
			tokenStore.oauth_registry = current.sys_id;
            tokenStore.auth_token = tokenResponse.getAccessToken();
			tokenStore.insert();
			gs.info("Keeper security Authentication token generated.");
			gs.info("keeper security credential entry updated.");
        } else {
            gs.error("OAuth Token Generation Failed: " + tokenResponse.getErrorMessage());
        }

	}
	catch (error){
		gs.error("Keeper Security: "+error);
	}

	// Add your code here

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>srujan-metron</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-01 08:26:43</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6855f912c3c7aa50eb251c63e4013187</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>create entry in keeper security creds</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Keeper Security ITSM" source="x_keese_keeper_sec">ada622f0c3f66210eb251c63e40131fd</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Keeper Security ITSM">ada622f0c3f66210eb251c63e40131fd</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_6855f912c3c7aa50eb251c63e4013187</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>srujan-metron</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-01 08:59:48</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=6855f912c3c7aa50eb251c63e4013187"/></record_update>
